com.meltmedia.cadmium.email
Class EmailUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.meltmedia.cadmium.email.EmailUtil

public class EmailUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A set of static utility methods and constants to aid in the creation of javamail messages.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String DISPOSITION_ATTACHMENT
          The content disposition for attachments that require user action - "attachment"
static java.lang.String DISPOSITION_INLINE
          The content disposition for attachments that are shown in the email client - "inline"
static java.util.regex.Pattern FILE_NAME_PATTERN
          The pattern used for parsing content disposition file names from url paths.
static java.lang.String FILE_NAME_REGEX
          The regex used for parsing content disposition file names from url paths - "\\A.*?([^/])*\\Z".
static java.lang.String SUBTYPE_ALTERNATIVE
          The mime subtype for alternative mime messages - "alternative".
static java.lang.String SUBTYPE_MIXED
          The mime subtype for mixed mime messages - "mixed".

          The mime subtype for related mime messages - "related".

fileNameForUrl

public static java.lang.String fileNameForUrl(java.net.URL contentUrl)
Returns the content disposition file name for a url. If a file name cannot be parsed from this url, then null is returned.
